definition: keratin (protein forming nails and feathers etc)
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The sulfurous smell of Burning keratin is distinctive.
sentences.chinese: 可從燃燒時的硫磺味識別出角蛋白。

sentences.english: The whiskers have a function of improving mechanical property of the keratin membrane.
sentences.chinese: 晶須具有改善角蛋白膜機械性能的作用。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, he found that these keratin layer of the foreskin significantly thickened.
sentences.chinese: 兩週後，他發現這些包皮的角蛋白層顯著增厚。

sentences.english: Keratins are main components of the intermediate filaments (IFs) in higher plant cells.
sentences.chinese: 角蛋白是植物細胞中間纖維的主要成分。

sentences.english: Our hair is made of a type of protein called keratin .
sentences.chinese: 我們的頭髮是由一種稱爲角蛋白的蛋白質。

sentences.english: The immunohistochemical study of keratin of ovarian tumors was made in 47 cases.
sentences.chinese: 本文對47例卵巢腫瘤進行了角蛋白免疫組化的研究。

sentences.english: High-efficiency hydrolytic equipment for feather-keratin was created and studied.
sentences.chinese: 研創了高效的羽毛角蛋白微生物水解裝置。

sentences.english: Optimum hydrolysis conditions are determined in the extraction of cystine from keratin.
sentences.chinese: 實驗確定了從角蛋白中提取胱氨酸的最佳水解終點。

sentences.english: The main component of hair is known as keratin .
sentences.chinese: 頭髮的主要成分被稱爲角蛋白。

sentences.english: To study and analyze the extraction of keratin from egg-shell membrane.
sentences.chinese: 研究並分析了蛋膜中角蛋白的提取方法。

sentences.english: One of the products they have developed is a flowerpot. It may look like other flowerpots.
sentences.chinese: 他們用角蛋白製成的產品中，有一種是花盆。

sentences.english: "Wet" keratin, under the microscope, appears as cohesive eosinophilic squames arranged in pavement-like sheets.
sentences.chinese: 溼角蛋白鏡下是鱗狀細胞排列呈緻密的嗜酸性團塊。

sentences.english: But the positive reaction of keratin was found in inner cells of tubular and central cells of trabecular patten.
sentences.chinese: 而小管的內層細胞和小梁中央細胞呈角蛋白陽性。

definition: stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
